column2: this is NOT just sushi... it's an experience! Sush Delish! My friend invited us when we were visiting Houston
column3: and he did not disappoint. Don't expect to be full afterwards
column4: this is not a place to go if you're really hungry. This is a great impress-a-date kinda place. Prepare to pay a little extra... ok
column5: A LOT extra... but totally worth it.
